projects.title: Recipe Manager Application
projects.subtitle: Java, JavaFX, MySQL
projects.description: Full-stack recipe management with secure auth, profile management, discovery and filtering.
projects.summary: A desktop-first recipe manager where users can create, organize, and discover recipes. The app supports secure authentication, profile management, and powerful search/filtering across ingredients, tags, and cuisine. I focused on clean domain modeling, performance of large lists, and a smooth, responsive UI.
highlights: Designed domain models and repositories for recipes, ingredients, tags, and profiles
Implemented full authentication and role-based access with secure password storage
Optimized list virtualization and incremental loading for large recipe catalogs
features: Create, edit, and categorize recipes with images
Advanced filtering by ingredient, cuisine, and tags

challenges.problem: Large lists caused UI jank during filtering
challenges.solution: Introduced indexing and batched updates; moved heavy work off the UI thread
Added versioned SQL migrations and data seeding scripts
